word: It is a wonderful thought that human beings can speak the Word of God, in simple words of comfort and encouragement. The humblest instruments will be used of God to sow the seeds of truth, which may spring up and bear fruit, because the one in whose heart they were sown needed help--a kind thought, a kind word, made effective by the One who has said, "Lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world."--Letter 329a, Nov. 16, 1905, to her 19-year-old granddaughter Mabel.
